name: Desert Bus Express
description:
A game made for Desert Bus game jam

You're name is Bill.

You are a bus driver! You don't get much sleep as you work all day and night 24/7.

You're shift begins at 6pm when you clock in via the red button, then get in your bus and pickup passengers around the city and drop them off at the red drop off.

How many nights are you willing to do?

Every morning at 6 am you are brought back home to drink coffee then carry on working! sleep is for the weak!

Don't let your energy reach 0! drink coffee when needed to stay awake!

Controls:

Left click to move

Right click to interact

#DBGameJam
